body_html:
...where tensor can be either a scalar (which would select all the values in that column) or a vector which can select individual columns in the rows, so:

foo = tf.constant([[1,2,3], [4,5,6]])
foo[:, 1] # [2, 5]
indexes = tf.constant([1, 2])
foo[:, indexes] # [2, 6]

...where tensor can be either a scalar (which would select all the values in that column) or a vector which can select individual columns in the rows, so:
foo = tf.constant([[1,2,3], [4,5,6]])
foo[:, 1] # [2, 5]
indexes = tf.constant([1, 2])
foo[:, indexes] # [2, 6]
body:
...where tensor can be either a scalar (which would select all the values in that column) or a vector which can select individual columns in the rows, so:

```
foo = tf.constant([[1,2,3], [4,5,6]])
foo[:, 1] # [2, 5]
indexes = tf.constant([1, 2])
foo[:, indexes] # [2, 6]
```
